title: New: Liyv – Now You Say You Love Me
body:
Really love this new track from Seattle’s **Liyv** – which manages to come across as simultaneously shiningly optimistic yet with more sober undertones.

There’s touches of Marian Hill and Oh Wonder in both the songwriting and production, however it comes across as perhaps more emotionally honest, coming from an even purer place. Check out _Now You Say You Love Me_ below.

_‘now you say you love me / but it’s too late to / i restarted my heart / gave up the part that belonged to you / ’cause i never thought you’d love me too’_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
